ca: No he entès la teva pregunta
No he acabat d'entendre què m'has demanat
es: No he acabado de entender qué me pediste
en: I did not understand what you just asked
I did not get what you asked
I'm sorry, I did not understand you

ca: No sé a qui et refereixes
Perdona, no trobo cap professor similar a qui dius
es: No sé a quién te refieres
Perdona, no encuentro a ningún profesor similar al que dices
en: I dont know who are you asking about
I'm sorry, I cannot find any similar teacher to who you asked about

ca: No sé per quina assignatura m'estàs preguntant
Perdona, no trobo la assignatura a la que et refereixes
es: No sé de qué asignatura me hablas
Perdona, no encuentro la asignatura por la que me preguntaste
en: I could not understand the subject you asked about
I don't know what subject are you asking about
I'm sorry, I did not understand the subject you asked about
I think that this subject does not exist

ca: No estàs matriculat a aquesta assignatura
es: No estás matriculado en esta asignatura
en: You did not enroll this subject
You have no exams coming soon
You don't have exams coming soon

ca: No tens cap pràctica a entregar pròximament
es: No tienes ninguna práctica a entregar próximamente
en: You have no practical works to deliver soon
You don't have practical works coming soon
